duties_responsibilities.duty: Function as a manager of the facility Nursing Department under the direction of the Director of Nursing 3 (Psychiatric)
Assist with the development and implementation of nursing policies and procedures
Interpret rules, regulations, and laws related to nursing practice
Assist with planning, establishing, evaluating, and maintaining standards of nursing care
Develop staff training programs and supervise nursing staff
Participate in the recruitment and selection of nursing staff
Monitor licensure and credentials of nursing staff and ensure compliance with various accreditation standards for nursing care

education_certification.credential: Registered Nurse license and current registration to practice nursing in New York State
